argument.name: recno
argument.description: The record order number of the desired record.

page.description: Goes to a specified record number
page.discussion: The .RECNO_GOTO() method makes the specified record number current. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example displays the Inventory form with record number 6.
section.example: dim sptr as P sptr = form.load("Inventory") sptr.Recno_goto(6) sptr.show()
